1.15.2.0.3.0: Crafting remote added.  Dimension network upgrade.
1.15.2.0.3.1: JEI recipe transfer fixed for crafting remote.  Fixed clear recipe button in crafting remote.  Added block-tag (similar to ore dictionary) search support to the network, for example '$wooden'.
1.15.2.0.3.2: Tooltip fixed. Fixed visual bug where cables showing connection to 2 chests when in reality only one was connected
1.15.2.1.0.0: Filter cables drop their upgrades when broken.  Import filter button fixed for import and export cables.  Player gets a chat status message when connecting a remote to the network, or when using a new remote that is not connected.  Update button textures.
1.15.2.1.0.1: Recipes now use data tags for wider compatibility (similar to old ore dictionary).
1.15.2.1.0.2: Pull Request by  itgenie98: Fix hardcoded value in TileMaster for 1.15 #349
